components.description: A series of three Zs making a Zzz. Represents sleeping, snoring, dreaming, or any sleep-related state. Can also be used in some contexts to represent something that is boring.
components.title: Sleeping Symbol

description: A series of three Zs making a Zzz. Represents sleeping, snoring, dreaming, or any sleep-related state. Can also be used in some contexts to represent something that is boring.
title: Sleeping Symbol

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Comic style symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A series of three Zs making a Zzz. Represents sleeping, or snoring. Can also be used in some contexts to mean ‚Äúboring‚Äù. Zzz was approved as  http://emojipedia.org/sleeping-symbol/
emoji_net_data.name: zzz

bn:00101830a: Showing lack of attention or boredom

bn:00093286v: To breathe during sleep with harsh, snorting noises caused by vibration of the soft palate.
Breathe during sleep with harsh noises.

bn:00072101n: A natural and periodic state of rest during which consciousness of the world is suspended
A periodic state of physiological rest during which consciousness is suspended and metabolic rate is decreased.
The state of reduced consciousness during which a human or animal rests in a daily rhythm.
Sleep is a naturally recurring state of bodily rest involving altered consciousness, relatively inhibited sensory activity, and inhibition of nearly all voluntary muscles.
State characterized by reduced or absent consciousness
In animals, sleep is a naturally recurring state characterized by altered consciousness, relatively inhibited sensory activity, and inhibition of nearly all voluntary muscles.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'zzz' emoji is a playful and instantly recognizable symbol of sleep or exhaustion. The letters 'Z' are presented in a bold, slightly rounded font, characteristic of Apple‚Äôs clean design aesthetic, and are subtly shaded to give them a gentle 3D presence. Soft, wispy lines emanate from the letters, visually representing a deep slumber or the quiet hum of sleep, conveying a sense of rest and relaxation with a touch of whimsy.
